operation.descriptionCdata:
50b9fc31-c114-465d-99e3-58211c131434.description=
This determines which process on a machine has used the most CPU time

Inputs\:
	host\:           host name to check
	username\:       user name to login into host as
	password\:       password to use for login

Responses\:
	success\:         If the operation worked
	host not found\: If the host cannot be found
	authentication failure\: If the login fails
	failure\:         Any other error condition

Results and Context\:
	The process name is placed into the operation result
	The process name is placed into the context variable "largestProcess"
	The PID is placed into the context variable "PID"
	The number of seconds used is placed into "maxSeconds"
operation.name: Process using the most CPU time

scriptlet.name: Operation Process using the most CPU time (a1a7fbe7-a25a-44f1-ac8c-bbaa215e29ba)
